dt-option.name: rowReorder.enable

type.description: Boolean flag to indicate if RowReorder should be enabled or not.

dt-option.default: RowReorder is enabled by default when the `rowReorder` property is included in the DataTables initialisation.
dt-option.description: This option can be used to disable RowReorder's end user interaction when the DataTable is first created. It can then later be enabled using the `-api rowReorder.enable()` API method.

example.title: Disable RowReorder using init options (to later be enabled via the API)
